description:
TPO 143/1990
T1 to T6 on TPO 

T1 - Conifer - Fell in order to repair road lift caused by roots. Replace with 
pleached Fruit tree. T2 - Conifer - Fell in order to repair road lift caused by roots. Replace with pleached Fruit tree.T3 - Poplar tree - Reduce by 4-6 meters in height, 4-6 meters in lateral spread on leaning stem over boundary.T4 - Conifer - Fell in order to repair road lift caused by roots. Replace with pleached Fruit tree.T5 - Conifer - Fell in order to repair road lift caused by roots. Replace with pleached Fruit tree.T6-12 - Conifer - Routine maintenance, reduce new growth in height by 1-2 meters and
by 1-3 meters on lateral spread.T13 - Poplar - Routine maintenance, reduce in height 4-6 meters, 3-5 meters lateral spread (Historic fungal fruiting bodies spotted at buttress). T14 - Poplar - Routine maintenance, reduce in height 4-6 meters, 3-5 meters lateral spread. T15 - Holm Oak - Routine maintenance, reduce in height 1-3 meters, 2-4 meters lateral spread due to significantly end weighted lateral limbs. 
T16 - Oak - Routine maintenance, reduce in height 1-3 meters, 2-4 meters lateral
spread in the interest of retention due to significant wounding and decay from butress to crown break. T17 - Lime - Routine maintenence, pollard. 
T18 - Conifer - Routine maintenence/ hedge training, reduce lateral spread by 1-3
meters due to over extended limbs.T19 - Lime - Routine maintenence, pollard to remove growth from neighbouring listed building.T20 - Lime - Routine maintenence, pollard to remove growth from neighbouring listed building.
